instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: [SOLVED]SSD replacement on Function keys MacBook Pro 13 from 2017 - possible?
threads.message:
Hi,

a little bit bit off topic...
Can someone tell me if a replacement is possible or is there a lock (like with the Wi-Fi card)?

I know the drives are swappeable on this model but will the system recognize the new drive inserted or not?
if not, anything we could do to bypass that?

About to upgrade a Fn keys MBP13‚Äù from 128GB to 256GB but asking before trying in case...

threads.title: [SOLVED]SSD replacement on Function keys MacBook Pro 13 from 2017 - possible?
threads.message: Never done it but I see no reason for problems.

threads.title: [SOLVED]SSD replacement on Function keys MacBook Pro 13 from 2017 - possible?
threads.message: Ok confirmed. Done without any difficulties.
